description: A briefcase with an ER555 Anti-Drone Sniper conversion kit, recommended accessories and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

All the parts necessary to convert an ER555 to an Anti-Drone Sniper, a long range drone killer. In order to reconfigure an already-configured ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.
A briefcase with an ER555 Carbine conversion kit, recommended accessories and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

All the parts necessary to convert an ER555 to a Carbine, a jack-of-all-trades.  In order to reconfigure an already-configured ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.
A briefcase with an ER555 Close Quarters Battle conversion kit, recommended accessories and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

All the parts necessary to convert an ER555 to Close Quarters Battle configuration, an all-in-one firearm and polearm good in both roles.  In order to reconfigure an already-configured ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.
A briefcase with an ER555 Squad Automatic Weapon conversion kit, recommended accessories and one ammo belt in a separate fireproof container. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

All the parts necessary to convert an ER555 to a Squad Automatic Weapon, which also serves as battle rifle. In order to reconfigure an already-configured ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.
A briefcase with an ER555 Sniper Rifle conversion kit, recommended accessories and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

All the parts necessary to convert an ER555 to a Sniper Rifle, highly accurate within its effective range. In order to reconfigure an already-configured ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.
A briefcase with an ER555 Urban Drone Destroyer conversion kit, recommended accessories, some grenades and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

All the parts necessary to convert an ER555 to an Urban Drone Destroyer, OmniCorp's close-quarters drone killer.  In order to reconfigure an already-configured ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.
A briefcase with an ER555 to QR555 Battle Rifle conversion kit, recommended accessories, grenades and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

All the parts necessary to convert a base Electrothermal Rifle 555 to a purely chemical propelled, integrally suppressed "Quiet" Rifle 555.  In order to convert an already-configured ER555 to QR555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model first. The QR555 has its own line of conversion kits.
A briefcase with a QR555 Carbine conversion kit, recommended accessories and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

All the parts necessary to convert a QR555 to a Carbine, a short ranged jack-of-all-trades.  In order to reconfigure an already-configured QR555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.
A briefcase with a QR555 Submachinegun conversion kit, recommended accessories and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

All the parts necessary to convert a QR555 to a Submachinegun, sort of like a suppressed P90 on steroids with bayonet. In order to reconfigure an already-configured QR555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.
A briefcase with a QR555 Designated Marksman Rifle conversion kit, recommended accessories and magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

All the parts necessary to convert a QR555 to a Designated Marksman Rifle, highly accurate with any ammo and "silent" with subsonic rounds. In order to reconfigure an already-configured QR555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.

A briefcase with a QR555 Squad Automatic Weapon conversion kit, recommended accessories and one ammo belt assembly kit for up to 500 subsonic rounds in a separate fireproof container. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

All the parts necessary to convert a QR555 to a Squad Automatic Weapon, sort of like a suppressed P90 on double steroids with bipod. In order to reconfigure an already-configured ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model, then assemble with the parts you prefer.
A briefcase with a QR555 to ER555 Battle Rifle conversion kit and recommended magazines. Activate or disassemble to unpack.

All the parts necessary to convert a "Quiet" Rifle 555 to a louder, UPS-consuming and more powerful Electrothermal Rifle 555.  In order to convert an already-configured QR555 to ER555, you'll need to disassemble it to the base model first. The ER555 has its own line of conversion kits.
